CustomField.description: Enter the number X to be used with the selected "Dynamic Value Function" (e.g., the number of days to add or subtract in a function like Add Days to Today for date fields). This field specifies the numeric parameter for the function applied to the dynamic value when stamping it on a record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the number X to be used with the selected "Dynamic Value Function" (e.g., the number of days to add or subtract in a function like Add Days to Today for date fields). This field specifies the numeric parameter for the function applied to the dynamic value when stamping it on a record.
CustomField.label: Dynamic Value Function (X)
